aicte internship certified by cisco, meta, ibm to kick start your journey !! *dear students of **charusat**.* teachnook is conducting an *aicte approved* internship for students, kindly go through this join the group, and fill out the form asap. register before slots get filled. *greetings!* *we are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with institution to offer a unique 2-month training + internship program. this advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need to enhance your career.* we are enrolling only *limited students* in the program. *it is mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get a call from our hr team:google form: < *to know more information join in whatsapp group:* * < *find the below attachments for reference:* *first month: *iit training has been designed in the form of live lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (login credentials will be provided to students after registration) no prerequisites required. *second month: *internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. the live industry project will give students experience in solving real-world problems. *project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which they must complete with their mentor. *project 2:- *capstone project: it's a group project assigned to a group of 10-12 interns. for each intern particular work will be assigned to them they have to work on it. (essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by the company side itself) *here are two types of sessions we are providing:* *1. blended program/recorded sessions: *you will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions which will be organized every weekend. *2. mentor-led/live sessions: *you will be having live zoom classes after 7 pm for 2 to 3 days a week. you will get your recorded sessions as well *lms(learning management system)* portal which you will have access to for 6 months. after completion of the program, the student shall receive : [image: âœ…] program completion certificate issued by institution and verified by wipro dice id. [image: âœ…] access to a growing community. *yatharth* *key account manager* *9364102817* *yatharth.sharma@teachnook.com <yatharth.sharma@teachnook.com>*

charusat_fte_depstar_invitation to workshop on web automation testing using selenium webdriver dear students, *greetings from charusat_fte_depstar !!!* *d**epstar, charusat* in collaboration with the *institution's innovation council (icc) *is excited to announce a workshop on *"web automation testing using selenium webdriver"* by *dr. jaishree tailor, associate manager at l&t technology services, vadodara.* this workshop will provide valuable insights and hands-on experience in web automation testing, a crucial skill in today's software development landscape. *workshop details:* - *date:* july 20, 2024, saturday - *time:* 10:00 am onwards - *venue:* will be communicated to the registered students *objective:* the workshop aims to leverage awareness of industrial test automation, covering roles, methodologies, tools, and frameworks for web applications. it will focus on web automation techniques to streamline testing static web forms, including element interaction, script modularization, and unit test conversion using pytest with selenium and python. *learning outcomes:* by the end of this workshop, participants will be able to: - explain the role of software testing in application development and differentiate between manual and test automation approaches. - utilize selenium webdriver to automate web application testing, including element identification, interaction, and assertion. - develop basic test automation scripts for interacting with various web elements (forms, dropdowns, links, etc.). - apply best practices for structuring and modularizing automation scripts for maintainability and reusability. - convert basic automation scripts into unit test scripts using the pytest framework. *pre-requisites:* participants are encouraged to brush up on python syntax, function/method design in python, and html form tags, attributes, and elements before the workshop. please make sure you have python 3.9 or above and pycharm community edition installed. *software requirements:* - python 3.9 or above: download here < - pycharm community edition: download here < *registration:* please register for the workshop by *clicking here. < **you can register early as seats are limited.* don't miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and learn from an industry expert. we look forward to your active participation. *please feel free to contact dr. kirti makwana (kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in <kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in>) and/or mr. kashyap patel (kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in <kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>) for any questions.* best

depstar_b.tech cse_ sem - 2_may 2024 examination _list of toppers dear students, it brings me immense joy to extend my heartfelt congratulations to each one of you on your remarkable performance in the recent *sem-2 b.tech cse university exams.* please find attached a* list of toppers *in the recent examination. as you move forward in your academic pursuits, remember that *learning is a continuous journey*, and your thirst for knowledge will undoubtedly lead you to even greater heights. i am excited to see the positive impact you will make in the field of computer science and engineering. *best wishes!!!* *notes: * - to decide the rank, the recent semester's sgpa was considered. - in case students have an equal sgpa then overall performance till semester -2 (cgpa) was considered. - in case students have an equal cgpa then marks in the theory examinations were considered. please get in touch with the undersigned if you have any questions.

fwd: how to simplify your software architecture ---------- forwarded message --------- from: david at cockroach labs <podcast@mail.cockroachlabs.com> date: thu, jun 27, 2024 at 10:31 pm subject: how to simplify your software architecture to: new episode â€” big ideas in app architecture. [image: listen now.] < hey ronak, modernizing database infrastructure can solve more than just data problems. it can also simplify your software architecture and the way your engineering organization works. in this episode, i sit down with my colleague rob reid to discuss the importance of architectural simplification through proven patterns, real-world examples, and practical use cases. join as we discuss: - the benefits of simplifying your data architecture - why you should think of regulations as part of your architecture - how in some cases, running a database across three data centers can be cheaper than two - what to know about selecting the right database for your use case listen now < or wherever you get your podcasts: apple podcasts < | spotify < | youtube < < david joy host, big ideas in app architecture Â© 2024 cockroach labs inc. 125 w 25th st. 11th floor, new york, ny 10001 join our community: < < < < < < < unsubscribe < // privacy policy < < --

fwd: aakruti global 2024 - product design competition for engineering students dear students, kindly go through the mail and participate. grab the opportunity. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- dassault systemes has launched worldwide student design challenge, called as aakruti global 2024. (refer poster for full details) < in sanskrit, "aakruti" means the *form*, *figure*, or *shape *of anything. we are thrilled to announce the opening of *aakruti global 2024* to more countries beyond india. students from the listed countries (*egypt, greece, india, indonesia, malaysia, poland, singapore, south africa, spain, thailand, the philippines, and turkey*) are encouraged to register and attend. what is aakruti global 2024? aakruti global 2024 is 14th edition of product design contest for students, sponsored and organized by dassault systÃ¨mes for the students. since its inception in 2011, more than 35,000 students have participated and benefited greatly. *the main objectives of aakruti are:* - provide students a platform to exhibit their creativity, innovative approach, and ingenious engineering skills - build a bridge between â€œacademiaâ€ and the â€œindustry.â€ - increase awareness about sustainability through product design *who should participate?* (1) students from all engineering branches. mechanical, civil, electronics, electrical, computer science, production, aerospace, mining, metallurgy & many moreâ€¦ (2) students from architecture colleges (3) students from design colleges (4) students from management & social sciences. (the contest is not limited to mechanical engineering students. students from various branches can participate & form multidisciplinary teams. in fact we want to recommend multi-disciplinary teams as real life problems and real life products are increasing multidisciplinary in nature). *benefits for students:* (1) win prizes. (2) connect with one of the top company in the plm space & create a possibility to be hired through showcase of talent. (3) get the best software tools from dassault systemes to work on the projects. get certification vouchers. (4) get mentored & trained. (5) top teams get an opportunity to present projects to juries from various industries, academia and specialist from dassault systÃ¨mes in pune campus, india. *how to register:* go to - < check guidelines of aakruti global 2024 *here* < *.* *themes of the contest: * sustainability (1) sustainable products for human wellness (2) green energy generation, transmission & storage (3) sustainable habitat / city infrastructure (4) sustainable mobility. once the students register, we will provide them more specific problem statements using which they can further imagine the possible solutions. **** they are not required to define their project at the time of registration itself*****. do not let your students miss this opportunity to participate in one of the best student competition in india. aakruti gets bigger each year and we have seen that the participation has grown all across globe, both in urban areas as well as rural areas. -- thanks & regards rudresh vyas education head (m) +91-9376211272 vadodara (ho) plot no. â€“ 173, gidc estate makarpura | vadodara - 390010 | india ahmedabad (bo) b-701, solitaire corporate park, prahaladnagar, sg highway | ahmedabad - 380015 | india surat (bo) 2nd floor, shreeji nivas, above a to z electronics, opp dhiraj sons, athwa gate | surat - 395001 | india mumbai (bo) 4th floor, 426, ajmera sikova, cts no. 174 a, lbs marg, opp. damodar park, nr. ashok mill, ghatkopar(w) | mumbai - 400086 head office: +91 265 263 6366/67 | ahmedabad (branch office): +91 79 40031186 | mobile: +91 9427611239 --

fwd: to participate in odoo combat 2024 - national level coding challenge dear students, we are excited to announce the odoo combat 2024, a national coding challenge designed to identify and celebrate the brightest young minds in the field of software development. this event, hosted by odoo, is an excellent opportunity for students to showcase their coding skills, learn from industry experts, and win exciting prizes. we are expecting 1000+ finest minds of india to participate in this event. odoo combat 2024 details - dates: 29-30 june 2024 - location: odoo in pvt ltd, < gandhinagar, gujarat < - registration link:odoo combat 2024 registration < < why participate? 1. skill enhancement: students will solve real-world problems, enhancing their coding and problem-solving skills. 2. networking opportunities: participants will have the chance to connect with industry professionals and like-minded peers. 3. prizes and recognition: winners will receive cash rewards and recognition from odoo. 4. career growth: outstanding participants may receive internship and job opportunities with odoo and its partners. who can participate? this competition is open to all students and fresh graduates in india with a passion for coding and technology. whether they are from computer science, information technology, or any related fields, this is a chance for them to shine. *attached is a flyer with more details about the competition that you can share with your student community.*

fwd: announcement of certification course on "machine learning and data science: from beginner to expert" regards, radhika h. patel, assistant professor, department of information technology, devang patel institute of advance technology and research (depstar), charusat, changa ---------- forwarded message --------- from: dean fca charusat <dean.fca@charusat.ac.in> date: fri, 24 may 2024, 12:43 pm subject: announcement of certification course on "machine learning and data science: from beginner to expert" to: charusat family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in> dear family members, greetings of the day! it's our pleasure to announce the certification course on "machine learning and data science: from beginner to expert", which at its core focuses on empowering a learner to master the skills essential for today's data-driven world. this course is designed for all undergraduate and postgraduate students / phd scholars / faculty members / working professionals who wish to understand the domain and make their career in it. the course will begin on june 29, 2024 (saturday), featuring *hybrid sessions* every saturday, covering a wide range of essential content (the detailed content can be found here - ). the brochure for the same is attached herewith for your kind reference. the registration form for the course is - the registration fee for this course is rs. 499/- and the last date to register for the course is june 20, 2024. you all are requested to circulate this message with the brochure to your students/faculty members and encourage them to register for the same. thank you.

achievement in khel mahakumbh state level taekwondo tournament. dear all, greeting of charusat sports report on pankti akbari achievement in khel mahakumbh-2024 state level taekwondo tournament. we are thrilled to announce that pankti akbari(23cs001) a student of the computer science engineering department at the chandubhai s. patel institute of technology, affiliated with charotar university of science and technology (charusat), has demonstrated outstanding prowess in taekwondo. pankti secured the 1st place at the district level khel mahakumbh taekwondo tournament held in surat. building on this remarkable performance, she went on to achieve a gold medal at the state level tournament on 16 may, 2024 her dedication, hard work, and exceptional skill have not only brought her personal accolades but have also made our university proud. we extend our heartiest congratulations to pankti akbari for this significant achievement and wish her continued success in all her future endeavours. congratulations, pankti! charusat - proud to nurture champions -- dr.pritesh patel assistant director of physical education and sports charusat physical education and sports section (a constituent of charusat) *accredited with "grade a+" by naac, goi* *accredited with centre of excellence by gog* landline no: 02697-265036 mobile : 95582 95583 -- 97142 96999 --

students are invited for summer placement training and internship @ top mnc's *dear students,* *congratulations on being shortlisted for our prestigious internship program!* *we are excited to announce the launch of our 2-month training + internship program, organized by teachnook's in collaboration with iit roorkee cognizance and designed by ibm.here's a detailed overview of the program:* *first month: training:* - *engage in ibm training through live lectures and benefit from mentorship by industry professionals.- gain access to the ibm portal for interactions with trainers and peers.- receive login credentials upon registration to begin your learning journey.* *second month: internship:* - * participate in an internship with live mentorship, working on real-world projects under professional guidance.- this practical experience will enhance your understanding of industry practices and hone your skills.* * projects:* - *minor project: an individual project to demonstrate your skills and creativity. dedicated sessions will help you build and enhance your resume.- major project: collaborate with a team of 15 interns on a group project. you will be assigned specific responsibilities, and the company will provide the necessary data and materials.* *third month: evaluation and opportunities:* - *based on your performance, you will undergo a technical interview within the same company.- a successful interview could lead to a stipend-based internship opportunity.* *program completion benefits:* - *comprehensive training from basic to advanced concepts.- guaranteed internship opportunity.- 3+ accredited certificates with wipro verification.- placement assistance.- completion of at least 3 industry-based projects.- letter of recommendation from project heads.- mock interviews and group discussions for placement preparation.- access to live and recorded sessions.- 24/7 exclusive support.- doubt/query support through live sessions.* *donâ€™t miss this incredible opportunity to jumpstart your career!!!* *apply now:* *[ < *for more information and updates, join our official whatsapp group*: * [ < * top preferred courses:- artificial intelligence- data science- machine learning- cloud computing- full stack web development* *we look forward to welcoming you to our program and guiding you towards a successful career.* *thank you*

internship and job assistances dear students, are you ready to seize the opportunity of a lifetime? we're here to ensure you don't miss out on the chance to revolutionize your future! at ediglobe, we're committed to empowering students like you with the skills and experiences needed to thrive in today's competitive world. we're excited to announce enrollment openings for our comprehensive training, internship, and globally recognized certification programs! here's why you shouldn't miss out: 1. hands-on training: gain practical skills and industry insights through hands-on training sessions led by industry experts and seasoned professionals. 2. real-time projects: apply your knowledge in real-world settings with hands-on projects that simulate industry scenarios and challenges. 3. earn premier certification including co-branded internship completion, course completion and lor upon completion of the program 4. get globally recognized exam certification: earn certifications from top mncs like ibm, cisco, adobe, and many more, validating your expertise and enhancing your career prospects globally. 5. networking and mentorship: connect with a diverse community of learners and professionals, and benefit from mentorship opportunities to guide you along your journey. time is slipping away, and opportunities like this don't come knocking twice. we've kicked off the enrollment process, and slots are filling up faster than we could have ever imagined. don't let this moment pass you by. enroll now and join us on a journey that promises to redefine your future in ways you never thought possible. *fill the form below to start your enrollment process our team will reach out to you in next 24 hours to give you brief description about our program :* link :- if you have any questions or need further information, feel free to reach out to us at your email id sudha.manikanta@ediglobe.com . we're here to support you every step of the way. here's to your success! warm

to: training placement <training-placement@ybifoundation.org> *respected sir/ma'am,* greetings for the day! the current global and indian job market demands engineering graduates from any branch with essential data science and ai skills. also, the government of india and aicte recognized the importance of artificial intelligence (ai) and hence initiated various programs to promote data science and ai skills for every engineering student at college campus. *ybi foundation **(section 8 not for profit company) *is pleased to announce *6 weeks free live online internship cum certificate program in data science and artificial intelligence* for engineering students pursuing *b.tech and m.tech* of all branches and academic years. the highlights of this *free online internship cum certificate program * - engineering students of all branches can apply - no prior programming skills required - online live classes in hindi + english - beginner to advance level - 1:1 live doubt resolution session - hands-on experiential learning on real world projects - structured study material - resume building - enhance student placement opportunities - *digitally verified internship completion certificate* any student of *b.tech and m.tech* (*computer science, it, **electrical, electronics, mechanical, civil* and all other engineering branches of *2023/2024/2025/2026/2027* *passed out/passing batch* can apply. *program start date: 6th may **(next batch starting every monday)* *last date to apply: 15th june **(rolling admissions till june 2024)* *duration: 6 weeks* *register from below link *for any difficulty in enrollment contact* (+91) 966 798 7711* *registration link: < * < *please note : this free online internship cum certificate program is completely free of cost.* if you have any query, please feel free to call or whatsapp us at (+91) 966 798 7711 or write to us at support@ybifoundation.org [image: free 6 weeks internship cum certificate program in data science and ai skills.png] -- you received this message because you are subscribed to the google groups "training placement" group. to unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to training-placement+unsubscribe@ybifoundation.org. to view this discussion on the web visit < . --

fwd: guidelines for me145 eoe practical exam, may 2024 from: dr. sagar chokshi <sagarchokshi.me@charusat.ac.in> date: thu, may 2, 2024 at 10:42 am subject: guidelines for me145 eoe practical exam, may 2024 to: cc: dear students, please find the *guidelines for me145 eoe* *practical exam *below. 1. eoe practical exam will be conducted in* eg lab* 322, second floor, a6 building. 2. the following is the evaluation pattern as per pedagogy of me145 eoe. internal evaluation external evaluation sheet-1 sheet-2 experiments total practical performance viva total out of 10 out of 07 out of 08 out of 25 out of 15 out of 10 out of 25 3. to evaluate external 15 marks, engineering drawings will be asked from any chapters randomly that you have to draw within a given time (approx. 30 mins to 45 mins will be given as per the questions) during practical performance 4. to evaluate external 10 marks, *viva* will be conducted by an external examiner from all eg/civil/mechanical portions. 5. formal dressing is mandatory for practical examination. you can contact me if you face any queries during and before the eoe practical exam. mob. no. +91-9726622007. --- radhika madam is requested to forward this email to depstar students. --- thanks & regards, *dr. sagar chokshi,* associate professor, department of mechanical engineering, chandubhai s patel institute of technology faculty of technology & engineering, charotar university of science & technology (charusat), accredited with â€œa+â€ grade by naac education campus changa -388421 at. & post changa-388421, ta: petlad, dist: anand, (gujarat) india. ph.no. +91-2697-265329; mob. no. +91-9726622007. ______________________________ ______________________________________________________ *vidwan id 161284: * *orcid id **0000-0002-6530-0843**: * *scopus author id 57204589169: * *wos researcher id **acl-8870-2022**: * *research gate id: * *google scholar profile: * --

fwd: reminder and instructions for ma144 quiz. dear students, an online quiz for ma144: engineering mathematics -ii is scheduled today at 11:25 am to 12:00 noon. kindly note down the following instructions before appearing for the quiz. *instructions* 1. the quiz will be conducted through google forms, login using your institute email id only. 2. ensure that your device and internet connection are functioning properly before starting the quiz as no technical queries will be entertained. 3. there is no provision for retaking the quiz, those students who fail to appear for the quiz or have not submitted the quiz on time will lose their marks. marks will be considered for internal evaluation. 4. syllabus of quiz: all units. 5. the link will be activated exactly at 11:25 am and will be closed at 12:00 noon. make sure to submit the quiz before 12:00 pm. 6. kindly fill up the correct roll number(in capitals), institute and other details asked on the first page of the form. 6. the link to access the quiz (google form) is as follows: * < kindly prepare accordingly and make sure to adhere to the instructions provided. best regards, jignesh chauhan mobile: 7600122587 -- *jignesh chauhan(ph.d. mathematics)* assistant professor department of mathematical sciences, p. d. patel institute of applied sciences, charotar university of science & technology, off. nadiad-petlad highway, changa, anand â€¢ 388 421, gujarat, india [image: email-icon] jigneshchauhan.maths@charusat.ac.in [image: facebook icon] < [image: linkedin icon] < [image: twitter icon] < [image: instagram icon] < --

quiz 2 | engineering physics - 2 | py143 google forms thanks for filling out quiz 2 | engineering physics - 2 | py143 here's what was received. quiz 2 | engineering physics - 2 | py143 syllabus: experiment 1, 2, 3, and 4 email * 23dcs023@charusat.edu.in name * james dhandhukiya student id no. * 23dcs023 institute - deparmtment * depstar - cs quiz 2 | engineering physics - 2 | py143 which of the following statements is true regarding the sensitivity of a wien bridge circuit for capacitance measurement? * higher sensitivity is achieved with lower values of resistance and capacitance higher sensitivity is achieved with higher values of resistance and capacitance sensitivity is not affected by resistance or capacitance values sensitivity depends only on the frequency of oscillation which parameter is usually adjusted to balance a wien bridge circuit during capacitance measurement? * capacitance inductance voltage resistance in a wien bridge circuit, how does the balance condition affect the voltage at the output? * voltage is zero voltage is maximum voltage is minimum voltage is constant which of these is a disadvantage of the wien bridge oscillator? * it cannot fabricate a pure tune distortion observed in output is high it cannot be used for high-resistance values there is no automatic gain control in an ac bridge circuit, what type of impedance is typically measured? * purely resistive purely capacitive purely inductive complex impedance containing resistance, capacitance, and/or inductance in a series lcr circuit, capacitive reactance (xc) = inductive reactance (xl) then circuit ___________. * is capacitive is at resonance is inductive draws minimum current in the "study of resonance in lcr circuit" experiment, the range of the frequency oscillator was fixed to ____________. * 20hz to 200hz 200hz to 2khz 2khz to 20khz 20khz to 200khz identify the experiment from the apparatus given below. * captionless image experiment no. 1 (cx) experiment no. 2 (lcr) experiment no. 3 (rc) experiment no. 4 (bx) in the lcr circuit experiment, if resistance in the circuit increases then _____________. * the peak of the resonance decreases. capacitance decreases. current through the circuit increases. it does not affect the current. how does increasing the capacitance in an lcr circuit affect the resonant frequency? * resonant frequency increases resonant frequency decreases resonant frequency remains constant resonant frequency fluctuates randomly consider a circuit where r and c are connected in series with a dc source, such that r is zero ohms. in that scenario, the time constant of the circuit would be? * zero infinity infinitesimal none of the above if the value of the capacitance of a capacitor in a series rc circuit increases, then the time required to reach the saturation voltage across the capacitor would * remain same increase decrease none of the above current in the series rc circuit connected to a dc source, during charging: * increases monotonously with time decreases monotonously with time remains same none of the above in a series rc circuit connected to a dc source, the time constant is defined as the time (during discharging) when, * current/voltage drops to ln(e) times the initial value (ln: natural log) current/voltage drops to e times the initial value current/voltage drops to e^2 times the initial value current/voltage drops to 1/e times the initial value consider the following situations: (1) two capacitors connected in parallel with each other and then in series with a resistor having resistance r. (2) two capacitors are connected in series with each other and then in series with the same resistor as above. then: * the time constant of situation (1) would be greater than situation (2) the time constant of the situation (2) would be greater than situation (1) the time constant would be the same none of the above if the diameter of a coil is increased, what happens to the density of the magnetic field lines inside the coil? * increases decreases remains the same disappears if the diameter of a coil is doubled while maintaining the same current, what happens to the magnetic field strength at its center? * it doubles it halves it quadruples it remains the same when comparing two coils with different diameters and aligned perpendicular to earth's magnetic field lines, which coil will experience a stronger total magnetic field? * coil with a larger diameter coil with a smaller diameter it depends on the material of the coil both coils will experience the same magnetic field strength biot-savart's law is used to determine the: * the electric field around a charged particle magnetic field around a current-carrying conductor the force between two charged particles the potential difference across a resistor according to biot-savart's law, the magnetic field (b) produced by a current element (dl) is: directly proportional to the current (i) and inversely proportional to the distance from the current element (r) inversely proportional to the current (i) and directly proportional to the distance from the current element (r) directly proportional to the current (i) and the distance from the current element (r) inversely proportional to the current (i) and the distance from the current element (r) create your own google form report abuse

training & internship for charusat students *empowering future innovators: training & internship for charusat students.* [image: hand-holding-glowing-brain-technology-background.jpg] [image: 2150905287.jpg] *teachnook*, in partnership with (*cognizance*) *iit* *roorkee*, is thrilled to announce an exclusive 2-month training and internship program designed by industrial mentors. we have a limited number of slots available for enrollment in our program. secure your slot today before they're all filled! [image: 2149901783.jpg] [image: 4019.jpg] *program highlights: * gain real-world experience in cutting-edge technologies with our tech domain internship. work alongside industry experts on live projects, sharpen your programming skills, and learn the latest trends in ai, ml, iot, and more. collaborate with a dynamic team, solve complex problems, and innovate solutions that make a difference. get hands-on with industry-standard tools and technologies, preparing you for a successful career in the tech industry. *to ensure your participation and make the most out of this opportunity, please make sure to fill out the application form: * application form: * < *program promises:* - *36+ hours of live training* - *10+ live hands-on minor project* - *1 live capstone project* - *live doubt-clearing sessions* - *mentors from the market tech giants* - *cutting-edge curriculum* [image: 388.jpg] [image: 16406277_rm373-banner-02-s88.jpg] *internship: * provides practical experience with 10+ live projects alongside the training program. projects challenge students to apply learned skills in real-world situations. the capstone project, integrated into the final week of the internship, requires students to apply all learned skills and knowledge. *certificate of training and internship completion:* - *course completion certificate from cognizance iit roorkee.* - *internship completion certificate from top mncs.* - *includes wipro dice id verified certification.* [image: whatsapp image 2024-03-04 at 18.48.35 (1).jpeg] [image: whatsapp image 2024-01-20 at 13.58.19 (1).jpeg] *perks/benefits:* - *letter of recommendation.* - *ppo(pre placement offer opportunities).* - *resume building training.* - *interview preparations.* - *growth community access for further opportunities*. [image: whatsapp image 2024-03-19 at 00.58.46.jpeg] * we look forward to your active participation in the training and internship program under teachnook in collaboration with cognizance iit roorkee. this is an excellent chance for you to broaden your horizons and take a step towards a successful career. for any inquiries or assistance, feel free to contact us.* *best

invitation for summer training and internship @ top mnc's dear *charusat* student,* congratulations on being shortlisted for the internship program!* as mentioned above, *teachnook in collaboration with iit roorkee * *cognizance* is organizing a* 2 month training + internship program designed by ibm*. *interested students fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get a call from our executive;* *apply-** < *for more information join our official whatsapp group:* *join-** < *top preferred courses: * âœ… *artificial intelligence.âœ… data science.âœ… machine learning.âœ… cloud computing.* *âœ… full stack web development.* *here is an outline of the program's structure.* *first month: during the first month of the program, ibm training will be conducted in the form of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship from industry professionals. you will have access to the ibm portal, where you can interact with the trainers and fellow students. login credentials will be provided to registered students.second month: internship with live mentorship for projects from professionals. the live industry project will give students an experience in solving real-world problems.* *project 1 : minor project: the minor project is an individual project, and you will work on it independently. resume building session.* *project 2 : major project: the major project is a group project, and you will work in a group of 15 interns, with specific responsibilities assigned to each intern. the company will provide you with all the essential data and materials required for the project.* *third month: based on your performance during the first two months of the program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during the third month. if you perform well in the interview, you will be offered a stipend-based internship.* *after completion of the program, the student shall receive a :* - fwd: symposium on research exploration, c-rex (computer science research exploration) 2024. dear students, we are pleased to inform you that we are organizing a 1-day symposium on research exploration, *c-rex (computer science research exploration) 2024*. the symposium aims to provide computer science students (final year undergraduate, postgraduate as well as recently graduated) an opportunity to interact with researchers, academicians, and industry professionals from the field of computer science. the symposium will facilitate exposure to a wide spectrum of research domains in academia and industry. the symposium will feature sessions on: - securing the digital world: emerging trends and technologies - building intelligent systems: use cases and future directions - algorithms for hard problems - leveraging large language models for application development - swarm intelligence and computational data science - responsible ai considerations for search engine - department research showcase - research opportunities with us kindly visit the c-rex 2024 web site ( hyderabad.ac.in/crex2024/) for registration and other details. *prof.n.l.bhanu murthy* head computer science & information systems department, bits pilani hyderabad campus -- *department of computer science and information systems* bits-pilani hyderabad campus jawahar nagar, kapra mandal, medchal-malkajgiri district, hyderabad-500078 ph no: 040-66303875 the information contained in this electronic communication is intended solely for the individual(s) or entity to which it is addressed. it may contain proprietary, confidential and/or legally privileged information. any review, retransmission, dissemination, printing, copying or other use of, or taking any action in reliance on the contents of this information by person(s) or entities other than the intended recipient is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful. if you have received this communication in error, please notify us by responding to this email or telephone and immediately and permanently delete all copies of this message and any attachments from your system(s). the contents of this message do not necessarily represent the views or policies of bits pilani. -- you received this message because you are subscribed to the google groups "depstar_cse" group. to unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to depstar_cse+unsubscribe@charusat.ac.in. to view this discussion on the web visit < . --

charusat_fte_depstar_cse_certificate course in generative ai dear learners, *generative ai is revolutionizing various industries by enabling machines to autonomously generate content such as images, music, text, and more. *understanding and mastering generative ai opens doors to endless creative possibilities and innovative applications. with the rapid advancements in ai technology, there is a growing demand for professionals who can harness the power of generative ai to drive artistic expression, enhance user experiences, and solve complex problems. *department of computer science and engineering* (cse), depstar, a constituent institute of the faculty of technology and engineering (fte), charotar university of science and technology (charusat) extends a warm invitation to you for our upcoming *certificate course in generative ai*, scheduled from *may 13th to may 18th, 2024.* this intensive program will run for *5 hours every day*, offering an immersive learning experience in one of the most fascinating fields of artificial intelligence. *a resource person from googel inc. will transact the course.* *generative ai course overview* *generative ai *represents a unique convergence of creativity and technology, empowering individuals to design algorithms capable of producing art, music, and much more autonomously. throughout the course, you will delve into the fundamentals of generative ai, gaining insights into neural networks, deep learning architectures, and probabilistic models. guided by industry experts with extensive experience in ai research and development, you will learn to leverage state-of-the-art tools and frameworks to build your generative models. *key features* [image: image.png] *here are the key details of the course:* *dates: *may 13th to may 18th, 2024 *duration: *5 hours per day *mode of teaching: *offline + online *location:* will be communicated to the registered students *time:* 09:10 am onwards *registration fees* - *rs. 3,000 *for charusat students / alumni members - *rs. 3,500 *for external student participants - *rs. 5,000 *for external participants we believe that this course will not only expand your understanding of generative ai but also equip you with practical skills that are highly relevant in today's rapidly evolving job market. whether you aspire to pursue a career in digital art, music composition, gaming, or ai research, this course will provide you with the knowledge and expertise needed to succeed. to confirm your participation and reserve your spot in the course, please complete the registration process by april 30, 2024. for any questions or further information, feel free to reach out to *dr. kirti makwana* (+91-9586861680 | kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in) and/or *dr. chirag patel *(m - 7016945563 |chiragpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in). *key dates* [image: image.png] *enrol now - click here for the registration form < we look forward to welcoming you to our certificate course in generative ai and embarking on this exciting learning journey together. *grab this opportunity to learn and understand â€œgenerative aiâ€ and gain a certificate on successful completion of the course.* best wishes, for enrollment /query contact *+91- 70169 45563 / +91- 9586861680* [image: image.png] -- *dr. kirti makwana* mobile:+91-9586861680 *[image: inline image 1] * accredited with â€œa+â€ grade by naac, goi --

fwd: training to build ai (artificial intelligence) apps and websites for devang patel institute of advance technology and research students students learn to build hands-on ai projects. earn a certificate and an internship upon completion. dear professor dr.amit ganatra, earlier this month, we sent the link to our ai lesson plan generator to you. we thank professors like you for your feedback and appreciation. in case you have not received access to it then please let me know. many professors also expressed their interest in having their students enrolled in a training that teaches them to build such ai apps and websites. it is becoming increasingly important to learn how to build ai apps and websites in order to keep pace with technology and innovation. the demand for engineers with ai development skills is growing rapidly, and is expected to be a major factor in providing better job opportunities for students. companies are now actively looking to hire engineers with skills in ai. considering this, we are sharing the details of scholarship on our ai training. please share this opportunity with your students. we request you to forward the email to the students or click here to share over whatsapp. < what is the artificial intelligence (ai) scholarship and internship program? - as part of this program, the qualifying students of devang patel institute of advance technology and research can *join the artificial intelligence (ai) online video training at an 80% discount.* while the regular fee of the training is rs.8,600/-, the qualifying students can get it at just rs.1,750/-. - students have to visit < to answer the scholarship test. what are some of the activities that students will perform as part of this ai training? - learn concepts of artificial intelligence (ai) from the basics. no previous knowledge is required. - learn programming languages like python, html and javascript required to build these ai apps and websites. - during the training, we will be available to solve any doubts or queries. - students will build 6 different hands-on projects, such as their own chatgpt, ai recipe generator, ai software coding helper, ai image generator and many more... - they will also build innovative artificial intelligence (ai) projects by applying the learnings of the training in their field. why should the students avail this scholarship? - learn from basics. - *certificate:* upon completion of the training, which can be submitted as part of university rules as well as during the job application process. - *work on industrial projects: *the students will work on the most popular ai platform by open ai. the same platform is the base for chatgpt and is used by thousands of mncs across the globe. - *guaranteed internship upon training **completion: *this internship certificate can be submitted to the college if the university rules require them to do so. other critical points: - *the option of full refund:* in case the students are not happy with the training offered to them, then they can get a full refund as per the refund policy. this ensures that there is no risk for students or the faculty involved in the process. - *lifetime access:* students can register now and start the training after the exams or at any other time. they can also take a break in between. - link to answer the scholarship quiz: < the last date to avail the scholarship is tuesday, 26th of march 2024. my team and i are excited to teach devang patel institute of advance technology and research students about artificial intelligence (ai). if you have any questions, please reply to this email or call us at (+91)8881197198 and press 4 to speak with us. i'm happy to provide any further information you need. regards, rohit ts software developer - bolt iot bolt iot (inventrom private limited), 79, 11th cross rd, binnamangala, indiranagar, bengaluru, karnataka 560038, india, (+91)8881197198 unsubscribe < manage preferences < --

fwd: inviting applications for startup srujan seed support (s4) from your esteemed university/institute ---------- forwarded message --------- from: edic charusat <csic@charusat.ac.in> dear students, this is a great opportunity to receive financial support for your ideas and transform them into products. if any student is interested and has an idea for a startup or an innovative product, please contact me so that we can proceed with applying for the funds. dear sir/ma'am, greetings from gujarat student startup & innovation hub (ihub)! gujarat student startup and innovation hub (ihub), established as a flagship nodal agency by the state education department is envisioned to be a centre for all startup stakeholders to develop an end-to-end innovation and entrepreneurial ecosystem in gujarat by creating a pathway from mind-to-market. ihub is running 20 flagship programmes and nurturing over 400+ startups, supporting them with all the startup support verticals viz. co-working space, funding, networking opportunities, mentoring, capacity-building programmes, and infrastructural support. we extend startup support right from the ideation stage to the growth stage handholding startups from the beginning of their startup journey till they are ready to accelerate into the market with their ventures. ihub had launched the ğ’ğ­ğšğ«ğ­ğ®ğ© ğ’ğ«ğ®ğ£ğšğ§ ğ’ğğğ ğ’ğ®ğ©ğ©ğ¨ğ«ğ­ (ğ’ğŸ’) initiative to support innovative ideas and startups in availing the grants from inr 2.5 lac to 10 lac for their product development. till date, *250* startups have been supported by ihub under the startup srujan seed support initiative with the funding support of inr 13 crore. eligibility criteria for startup srujan seed support (s4): - any innovator/startup up to the age of 35 years, who is: - the innovators and startups aspiring to avail this could be in any stage as below: a school student of foundational/preparatory/middle/secondary level (up to class 12) from gujarat. a diploma/vocational/undergraduate/postgraduate/doctoral student or an alumna/alumnus from gujarat. any dropout from school/institute/university from gujarat. link to apply: < last date of application in this cohort: 15th may 2024 you may circulate the above information to all the innovators/startups in your university so that a maximum number of students/innovators/startups can leverage the opportunity. for any queries, you may reach out to mr. mrunal kakkad on +91 73838 54283 | mrunal@ihubgujarat.in thanks & regards, -- hiranmay mahanta ceo, *i*-hub < +91-9909959336 gujarat student start-up and innovation hub [image: ihubgujarat-in]ihubgujarat-in -- dr. jaimin n undavia, associate professor & coordinator, charusat startup and innovation cell, faculty of computer science and applications, changa m: 9426923708, 7283968701 ext: 5250 -- *nilesh kumar dubey**(phd)* assistant professor, computer science and engineering, institutional coordinator of *iqac*, *csic,* *uiic, ipr* devang patel institute of advanced technology & research charotar university of science and technology (charusat), changa-388421, gujarat, india. --

fwd: mcq test for internal evaluation of the subject environmental science. evaluation of internal 30 marks, the 20 marks mcq test for subject environmental science. fyi ---------- forwarded message --------- from: hemangi oza <hemangioza.cv@charusat.ac.in> date: wed, mar 13, 2024 at 10:09 am subject: mcq test for internal evaluation of the subject environmental science. to: dear all, as per our subject pedagogy, we have already announced an evaluation of internal 30 marks, the 20 marks mcq test will be held in the last week of march 2024. therefore, mcq test will be held on 30th march, 2024 (saturday) from 10.30 am to 11:00 am via google form on google class room platform. you are requested to circulate this mail to the students. the link of the exam will be mailed by me to the subject teacher who has taken the class. make sure that every student has joined the google classroom. following are the instructions which all the students have to follow: 1. mcq test will be conducted via google form on 30th march, 2024 (saturday). 2. link will be shared on google classroom so each student has to join the google classroom. if you have not joined, then communicate with your subject teacher and join as sson as possible. 3. mcq test will be of 20 marks and timings will be 30 minutes from 10:30 am to 11:00 am. 4. time will set for this slot so it will be automatically closed after 11:00 am. no students will be allowed to give the test after this time. this will be the first and last oppertunity for giving the mcq test for internal evaluation after this any excuses from students will not be considered, and any student will not be entertained. thank you with

fwd: cython-24 - a hackathon by iit-delhi and nciipc ---------- forwarded message --------- from: jalpesh vasa <jalpeshvasa.it@charusat.ac.in> date: wed, mar 13, 2024 at 10:17 am subject: cython-24 - a hackathon by iit-delhi and nciipc to: dear students, about cython 2024 cython 2024 - an initiative by nciipc ( a unit of ntro), in collaboration with the fitt, iit delhi, is a premier platform aimed at fostering innovation and entrepreneurship in the deep-tech domain. cython 2024 serves as a catalyst for translating groundbreaking ideas into tangible solutions by providing participants with the necessary resources, mentorship, and networking opportunities. participants of cython 2024 will embark on a transformative journey, from ideation to prototype development, guided by industry experts, seasoned mentors, and domain specialists. the program offers a unique blend of workshops, hands-on sessions, expert talks, and networking events, culminating in a grand showcase of innovative solutions. cython 2024 is not just a hackathon; it's a launchpad for aspiring techpreneurs to transform their ideas into impactful ventures. join us in shaping the future of technology and making a meaningful difference in society. let's unleash the power of deep-tech innovation together at cython 2024! ========================================= *a. cython 2024* following challenges have been opened for seeking solutions:- * challenge 1 (android security): development of android security framework based on owasp mobile top 10 2023 vulnerabilities. * challenge 2 (android security): development of tool for android kernel debugging enabling vulnerability analysis. * challenge 3 (authentication security): development of customisable browser extension in email & web login portals. * challenge 4 (web security): development of automated web pentesting & vulnerability discovery tool. * challenge 5 (fuzzing): development of dependency aware linux kernel based fuzzer *b. who should apply* * students * entrepreneurs, working professionals, faculties and researchers * aspiring indian startups at the ideation stage or pre-mvp/prototype stage *c. important dates* * registration started: 26 feb 2024 * registration will close: 17 mar 2024 * hackathon day: 06 apr 2024 at iit delhi *d. benefits* * prize money worth inr 15 lakhs * future engagement opportunity please visit for registration and latest updates. --

fwd: the launch event of aicte- vaani (vibrant advocacy for amplifying native indian languages) â€“ financial grant to conduct seminar/workshop/conference in regional languages - 8th march 2024 at 12 :15 pm. ---------- forwarded message --------- from: aicte(no-reply) <noreply1@aicte-india.org> date: thu, mar 7, 2024 at 2:31 pm subject: the launch event of aicte- vaani (vibrant advocacy for amplifying native indian languages) â€“ financial grant to conduct seminar/workshop/conference in regional languages - 8th march 2024 at 12 :15 pm. to: *dear sir/madam* the communication in regional languages is vital for effective developmental action. according to the census of india, 122 major languages and 1599 other languages out of which 30 languages are spoken by over a million native speakers in different parts of india. disseminating knowledge and strengthening the learning process through the medium of regional languages thus becomes a necessity to achieve the viksit bharat latest by 2047. all india council for technical education is launching a scheme titled *aicte- vaani* (vibrant advocacy for amplifying native indian languages). scheme provides financial assistance to the councils approved institutions to conduct conference/seminar/workshop of minimum 02days to maximum 03 days in the topics of emerging technologies through any of the widely used 12 regional languages. *prof. tg sitharam*, chairman aicte will launch *aicte vaani *on *8th march 2024 at 12:15pm*. *padmashri* *prof chaamu krishna sasthri*, chairman , bharathiya bhasha samithi shall grace the occasion as the guest of honor. you are hereby requested to encourage the faculty members and students of your good institution to attend the launch event through the link < . pfa attached banner. pfa:- *with

invitation to the inauguration of utkarshâ€™24: inter university sports extravaganza dear all, we are thrilled to invite you to the grand inauguration of "utkarshâ€™24", an inter-university sports extravaganza, which promises to be an exciting celebration of athleticism and sportsmanship. the event will take place on 8th march at 8:30 am at the main stage, cricket ground charusat university campus. utkarshâ€™24 will bring together teams from 19 participating universities across gujarat, making it a truly inclusive and spirited competition. the inauguration ceremony marks the commencement of three days filled with thrilling matches, friendly rivalries, and unforgettable moments. we cordially invite all members of the charusat family to join us as we kick off utkarshâ€™24 in the presence of teams from universities across the state. your presence and support will add to the excitement of the event and contribute to its success. we look forward to welcoming you to the inauguration of utkarshâ€™24 on 8th march at 8:30 am. let us come together to cheer for our teams, celebrate the spirit of sportsmanship, and create lasting memories. thank you for your continued support, and we hope to see you there! best

fwd: scholarship opportunity in ai (artificial intelligence) for devang patel institute of advance technology and research students students learn to build hands-on ai projects. earn a certificate and an internship upon completion. dear all i want to express my gratitude for the support you provided in reaching out to students during the past few months. professors like you have gone above and beyond to support students not only with their coursework but also helping them learn the latest technology beyond what is taught in regular course curriculum. we appreciate you for this. some time back we launched artificial intelligence (ai) training and have been thrilled with the response. in just a short amount of time, hundreds of students have enrolled. especially with the launch of chatgpt, ai is becoming increasingly pervasive across all industries, from healthcare and finance to entertainment and transportation. our ai training and internship program offers students the necessary skills to secure high-paying jobs in this field. considering this, we are launching a scholarship and internship program for our ai training and internship. please share this opportunity with your students. what is the artificial intelligence (ai) scholarship and internship program? - as part of this program, the qualifying students of devang patel institute of advance technology and research can *join the artificial intelligence (ai) online video training at an 80% discount.* while the regular fee of the training is rs.8,600/-, the qualifying students can get it at just rs.1,750/-. - students have to visit < to answer the scholarship test. what are some of the activities that students will perform as part of this ai training? - learn concepts of artificial intelligence (ai) from the basics. no previous knowledge is required. - learn programming languages like python, html and javascript. - during the training, we will be available to solve any doubts or queries. - students will build 6 different hands-on projects, such as their own chatgpt, ai recipe generator, ai software coding helper, ai image generator and many more... - they will also build innovative artificial intelligence (ai) projects by applying the learnings of the training in their field. why should the students avail this scholarship? - this four weeks of online video training is *excellent for those who want to start with artificial intelligence (ai)* because it teaches them to build projects from the basics. - *certificate:* upon completion of the training, which can be submitted as part of university rules as well as during the job application process. - *work on industrial projects: *the students will work on the most popular ai platform by open ai. the same platform is the base for chatgpt and is used by thousands of mncs across the globe. - *guaranteed internship upon training **completion: *this internship certificate can be submitted to the college if the university rules require them to do so. other critical points: - *the option of full refund:* in case the students are not happy with the training offered to them, then they can get a full refund as per the refund policy. this ensures that there is no risk for students or the faculty involved in the process. - *lifetime access:* students can register now and start the training after the exams or at any other time. they can also take a break in between. - link to answer the scholarship quiz: < the last date to avail the scholarship is tuesday, 20th of february 2024. my team and i are excited to teach devang patel institute of advance technology and research students about artificial intelligence (ai). if you have any questions, please reply to this email or call us at (+91)8881197198 and press 4 to speak with us. i'm happy to provide any further information you need. regards, rohit ts software developer - bolt iot bolt iot (inventrom private limited), 79, 11th cross rd, binnamangala, indiranagar, bengaluru, karnataka 560038, india, (+91)8881197198 unsubscribe < manage preferences < --

fwd: unicef's exciting opportunity for ai-powered job search [image: logo] dear thakkar ji, greetings from unicef india! as you know unicef is a united nations organisation and works in 190+ countries for children and youth. unicef has been working in india since independence and works closely with central and state governments through the nodal ministry of women and child development. four years ago, unicef set up a new initiative called yuwaah, which is a partnership platform with a mission to enable the youth to realise their potential. under the yuwaah initiative, unicef has signed letters of intent with the ministry of education, the ministry of skill development and entrepreneurship, ministry of labour and employment to name a few. thank you for participating in our recent survey on the needs of college students. through your feedback, and other college representatives, we were able to observe a significant interest in job support and career guidance. responding to this,*we are initiating specialised programmes to equip students with job-ready skills through a special 3-day ai bootcamp from 9-11 march, 10-11 am.* *your institution is one of the few that we are reaching out to for this opportunity.* this virtual seminar series will be free of cost and empower students to become *job ready* by learning how to use artificial intelligence in their job search journey. experts will guide participants in utilising new digital tools like chatgpt and gemini for resume building and interview preparation. you can share this poster digitally, or in print, within your network of college students through emails, whatsapp, and other channels along with this message: download the poster here. < ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- *dear students,* *unicef invites you to become a part of an exclusive learning opportunity that could transform your career journey! join a series of insightful workshops on how you can become job ready by learning how to use artificial intelligence in your job search journey.* *in today's competitive job market, mastering artificial intelligence is a game-changer. this workshop is designed to equip you with the skills needed to leverage ai in your job search.* *register today: * < *check out the poster for more details!* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- we would like to hear from you on this initiative. do let us know if you have any suggestions on any topics that you would like us to cover in subsequent seminars conducted by yuwaah at unicef. *warm regards, abhishek gupta* coo yuwaah at unicef want to change how you receive these emails? you can update your preferences < or unsubscribe < this email was sent to hod.cse@charusat.ac.in *why did i get this?* < unsubscribe from this list < update subscription preferences < unicef Â· new delhi 110003 Â· new delhi, delhi 110003 Â· india -- you received this message because you are subscribed to the google groups "depstar_cse" group. to unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to depstar_cse+unsubscribe@charusat.ac.in. to view this discussion on the web visit < . --

you all are welcomed to the upcoming course on liberal arts (*photography* - the specialization that you have chosen), which will be conducted between 5, 6 and 7 march, 2024 (wednesday, thursday, friday). please note that the course will be taught in the workshop mode (timings - 9:10 am to 4:30 pm) during (5, 6 and 7 march, 2024) at charusat campus, changa. *your internal as well as external evaluation will also be carried out during these 3 days only.* it is compulsory for you to attend the course and complete all assignments, tasks, activities given during these three days (5, 6 and 7 march, 2024). *it is compulsory to appear in internal and external examinations taken during these 3 days.* please carry a mobile phone or camera (with the data cable of the same) on all the three days of the workshop. join the respective google classroom mentioned below, using the code and link provided with your institute email id only. institute: depstar- cse, ce, it name of google classroom: liberal arts- march 2024- photography link : code: xbumlwc *please note that if you remain absent, do not complete the tasks/activities/assignments, you may fail in the semester and get a backlog.* *please take note of the following doâ€™s during the course,* 1. attendance is compulsory (means attendance in all the sessions during three days). 2. you must carry an identity card. 3. details of the schedule and venue of the course will be shared shortly via email. hence, please keep checking your charusat email inbox. it is requested that you check *spam folder* too, regularly, during these days, in case the email goes to the spam folder. please feel free to contact us via email on pranjalbhatt.cs@charusat.edu.in / 9429296329 , in case of any confusion, further information *dr. robert parmar*, assistant professor, humanities & social sciences (hss), charusat university. e-mail: robertparmar.cs@charusat.ac.in ; mob: 9925466788 we hope you will have a wonderful learning social sciences* *indukaka ipcowala institute of management* *charusat university, changa, india.* *accredited with "grade a+" by naac* *contact: 9429296329* --

fwd: eoc(activity) - invitation for awareness session on health and wellness program on 2nd march, 2024 *thanks and regards,* *radhika h. patel* *assistant professor* *department of information technology* *depstar,* *charusat, changa* ---------- forwarded message --------- from: neeta chudasama <neetachudasama.dce@charusat.ac.in> date: thu, feb 29, 2024 at 4:34 pm subject: eoc(activity) - invitation for awareness session on health and wellness program on 2nd march, 2024 to: cspit <cspit@charusat.ac.in>, <depstar@charusat.ac.in> dear sir/madam we are pleased to inform you that the department of computer engineering of depstar and m. s. patel department of civil engineering of cspit, in association with equal opportunity cell (eoc), is jointly organizing an awareness session on *health and wellness program on 2nd march, 2024.* health and wellness encompass holistic well-being, including physical fitness, mental resilience, and emotional balance, fostering a harmonious relationship between mind, body, and spirit for optimal vitality and quality of life. prioritizing health and wellness involves adopting sustainable lifestyle habits such as regular exercise, balanced nutrition, adequate sleep, stress management, and self-care practices to promote longevity and overall happiness. *dr. parthiv gelani,* a seasoned expert with over 11 years of experience in dermatology and 6 years of experience in health and wellness, will lead the session. the program aims to provide a comprehensive overview of how lifestyle diseases occur and how it can be cured without medicine and therefore living a happy and healthy life. moreover, it offers a platform for one-on-one discussions, allowing participants to address personal concerns directly with the expert. he has helped more than 15,000 people from more than 14 countries to achieve their health goals and lifestyle diseases such as diabetes, blood pressure, cholesterol, thyroid and common issues like gas, acidity, constipation, headache, etc. and helped them to live medicine-free lives. collectively, he had taught how to solve health issues by changing food and improving lifestyle. *objectives of the expert talk:* 1. provide accurate and up-to-date information on various health topics, empowering individuals to make informed decisions about their well-being. 2. encourage the adoption of healthy habits such as regular physical activity, balanced nutrition, adequate sleep, and stress management, promoting overall well-being and reducing the risk of chronic diseases. *event details:* date: march 2nd, 2024 time: 2:30 pm to 3:30 pm. venue: 229, seminar hall, depstar; a5 building registration link: certificates will be issued to all participate. we encourage all staff members (teaching and non-teaching), students as well as all employees to participate actively in this informative session. your valuable presence leads to success. faculty coordinator: ms.neeta chudasama (depstar-ce) ms. kanchan dave(cspit-cl) kindly circulate among your students and staff. thanks and regards, ms. neeta chudasama assistant professor department of computer engineering devang patel institute of advance technology and research (depstar) charotar university of science and technology (charusat) contact no.: 9428972072 --

fwd: invitation to participate in international conference on bhartiya knowledge system at ganpat university (march 22-23, 2024) *thanks and regards,* *radhika h. patel* *assistant professor* *department of information technology* *depstar,* *charusat, changa* ---------- forwarded message --------- from: principal depstar <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> date: tue, feb 27, 2024 at 8:20 am subject: fwd: invitation to participate in international conference on bhartiya knowledge system at ganpat university (march 22-23, 2024) to: depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in> ---------- forwarded message --------- from: guni-ganpat university <admission@guni.ac.in> date: mon, 26 feb 2024 at 7:14 pm subject: invitation to participate in international conference on bhartiya knowledge system at ganpat university (march 22-23, 2024) to: <principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in> dear sir / madam greetings from ganpat university -center for bhartiya knowledge system and ancient wisdom! it is our proud pleasure to extend an invitation to you to participate in the international conference on â€œrevitalising and rejuvenating bhartiya knowledge system for making bharat vishwaguru by 2047â€, organized under auspices of *ganpat university - **centre* for *bhartiya knowledge system and ancient wisdom during march 22-23, 2024.* the conference aims to bring together scholars, researchers, and practitioners from around the world to explore and discuss various aspects of the bhartiya knowledge system. since there are six different tracks, detailed below (covering all the disciplines of ganpat university), we believe that your expertise and knowledge would make a valuable contribution to the diverse perspectives we aim to showcase during the conference. *1) technology integration to ensure happiness * - smart living environments - educational technology for lifelong learning - cybersecurity and digital safety - health monitoring and wearables *2) bks based approaches in science, mathematics and language* - integration of bks in modern science education - vedic mathematics - sanskrit as a scientific language - ayurvedic science and traditional medicine *3) architectural splendors from past to present* - ancient indian city planning: reflecting upon our past for an organized future - indian temple architecture: understanding monumentality through a socioculturallens - forts and palaces of india: a representation of politics in constructionh - the bhartiya aspects of housing in india: a chronological study *4) rich indian heritage for health and wellness / ayurveda, dravyaguna and panchkarma* - mind-body connection in ayurveda - yogic practices for wellness - panchakarma therapy - culinary wisdom for wellness *5) agriculture, nutrition, and indian culture* - ancient agricultural practices - role of women in agriculture - festivals and harvest celebrations - challenges and innovations in agro-technology *6) vedik indian perspective on management * - corporate social responsibility (csr) in vedic perspective - timeless wisdom for decision-making - leadership insights from the vedas - holistic employee well-being the given clusters are not exhaustive. any topic in consonance to the main theme can be considered for participation. we encourage you to participate in the conference by submitting a research paper, poster or article under one of the aforesaid tracks. you may also participate as a delegate to relish the key note addresses, and engaging panel discussions relevant to bhartiya knowledge system. this conference provides an excellent platform for networking, knowledge exchange, and collaboration among academia and industry professionals. for detailed information regarding the conference themes, submission guidelines, and registration process, please refer to the attached event brochure or visit the conference website: < while we solicit your active participation, it is also a humble request to circulate this information to your academia and industry acquaintances for wider publicity and unprecedented response. thank you, *organizing team, **international conference on bks* *apply now* < *for details contact @ * student section at your institute / department / centre, ganpat university, ganpat vidyanagar â€“ 384012 | mob. no. +91 8100 61 61 61 | not interested? unsubscribe here < you will not get any correspondences from institute related to your application process once unsubscribed. --

2 credit compulsory course on liberal arts at charusat dear students, greetings! you must be aware that the faculty of humanities offers a *2 credit * compulsory *course on liberal arts.* please be informed that the liberal arts course opted by you will be taught in the *workshop mode *(9:10 am to 4:30 pm) during* 05, 06, and 07 march, 2023 *at charusat campus, changa. *please note that if you fail to attend the workshop, complete the tasks, activities and assignments, you may fail in the course and get a backlog.* *please make a note of following:* - ensure that your liberal arts course registration is completed on the e-governance and you have elected / registered for one of the liberal arts courses i.e. painting, photography, media and graphic design, contemporary dance, and dramatics. - each course of liberal arts is a 2 credit course. - *you are required to collect a kit*. the kit distribution is scheduled on *march 04, 2024* (from 9:30 am to 4:00 pm) in different slots. the venue for the kit distribution will be indukaka ipcowala institute of management. you will be informed about your slot for kit collection by your institute faculty coordinator. - students must bring the kit every day and take care of the materials and instruments given to them. in case, if something is lost, you will be required to manage it. - *ensure to maintain 100% attendance and completion of the assigned tasks/assignments / submissions during the liberal arts workshop. failing to do so may result in ff grade/backlog in this course. * - students need to report on time (at least 10 minutes before the stipulated time). - they must perform the practical or do the tasks assigned to them. - as the external resource persons are invited, you are also required to maintain discipline and decorum befitting the students of a university and professional programs. - it is required that every student carry their own identity card and wears it during all three days of the workshop. - details of the syllabus for the opted course, the evaluation scheme, and other instructions will be provided to the students in their kit as well as via email. - ensure that you have access to your teams / google classroom account as that will be required for further communications and submissions. - follow the instructions / guidance given by the resource persons / faculty coordinators. feel free to contact dr. pradipsinh b zala, mobile number: 9510963189 (institute coordinator) in case of any queries. happy learning! ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ with regards, *dr. pradipsinh b zala* assistant professor faculty of humanities *charotar university of science & technology (charusat) * changa-388421 | ta. petlad, dist. anand | gujarat *mobile no: +91-95109 63189* --

shepreneur - a stall showcase competition on 7th march 2024 dear students, greetings!!! the *women's development cell of charusat *will organize a *stall showcase* on *international women's day on 7th march 2024*. it is for all female students/faculty of charusat, where they can grab a chance to show their talents as well as entrepreneurial skills. there are certain activities in which girls can participate as per their wish; they will be provided a stall on the central lawn where they can sell things which are made out of their creativity. *no. of group(s):- max. 03 per department(cspit/depstar) /institute * *entry for participants per group-min 02 and max 05* *for female faculty: - only 01 group per department(cspit/depstar) /institute (participant per group min 02 and max 05) * *registration fees: 500 /- per group* (payable to respective wdc coordinator in cash) *one female candidate must be required in each group*, and registration should be in the name of a *female only. * the following event(s) are scheduled from 12:00 p.m. onwards. *1. art & craft: * you can sell any piece of art or craft like cards or wall art, etc...anything that is handmade using material like paper or threads or any other material is allowed. *2. quilling and handmade jewellery: * you can make jewellery using quilling, pearls, beads, stones or any other material and sell them at the appropriate price. *3. nail art, tattoos, mehendi: * anyone who is an expert in these three things can have a live audience to show their talents. kindly bring some samples with you to help you attract your audience. *4. paintings & drawings:* anyone who is an expert in paintings, drawings and sketches is welcome to sell their masterpieces. live sketching is also an option. *5. fashion design:* you can show your talent by designing clothes of your own. the patches made of thread work or any fashion-related ideas are welcomed. *6. food stall:* food is one of the most basic attractions, so anyone who loves cooking can have a food stall with all different varieties. you will have to bring all the required ingredients by yourself. *7. one minute games: * games are all about fun. you can come up with fancy ideas for little games. things required should be arranged by you. if you want to participate in the stall showcase competition, book your spot with your departmental wdc coordinator faculty. you need to give a 500 registration fee to your respective department faculty. *ce - sachi joshi * *cse - bansari patel * *it - ritika jani* *thanks & regards,* *bansari patel* *department of computer science & engineering,* *devang patel institute of advance technology and research (depstar),* *charotar university of science and technology (charusat)*

ibm and microsoft training + internship program by iit indore dear student, *congratulations on being shortlisted for the internship program!* *teachnook in collaboration with ibm *is organizing a *2 month training + internship program *designed by ibm. we are enrolling only limited students for the program. *students can fill out the form to get registerğŸ‘‡* * < *first month:* respective branch industry experts from* top mncs* will train you in the practical and industrial knowledge of a particular domain, so students can easily cope with the industry and strengthen their resumes. *second month:* during the internship, you will be provided with one minor and one major project. whatever has been understood in the 1st month can be applied in the project period *to gain real-time industrial experience* *the program offers you: * â— work on 10+1 major(live project of a start-up company) and 1 minor project under the supervision of industrial trainers. â— live interactive session with our industry experts for training and guidance. â— access to study materials for a total of 6 months â— infinite access to a community of 5l+ developers and tech enthusiasts. â— one-on-one mentoring sessions and access to expert assistance 24/7. â— personalized path/skill set designed based on your current skill and field of interest. â— get certificates approved by teachnook and partner companies post-project completion. *chance for getting training for attending examination from ibm or microsoft based on the domain.* *alekhya* key academic counsellor, 9640035134 korra.alekhya@teachnook.com teachnook edtech *enzyme**, no. 9,1, 9th main rd, opp. idbi bank, sector 6, hsr layout, bengaluru, karnataka 560102*
